cisc187.bigcalc

Class BigInt

  • java.lang.Object
    • cisc187.bigcalc.BigInt

  • public final class BigInt
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates Integers of (nearly) unlimited size.

    A BigInt is a sequence of digits. Each digit is a Integer element within a List The BigInt class stores the sequence and allows basic arithmetic operations on it's value.

    Can be created by passing numerical arguments in a List or String Data Type

    Since:
    05-18-2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alexander Vaughan (5448832)

      • addZeros

        public BigInt addZeros(BigInt b,
                       int count)
        After multiplcation adds all the following zeros based on exponential numberical increase from the arithmetic
        Parameters:
        b - The BigInt to add zeros to
        count - The amount of zeros to add to BigInt
        Returns:
        returns the previous BigInt with the appropriate amount of zeros at the end of its value

        IE: "6" to 6
